COMPLEXCITY繁复之城
 AriaCreations’ futuristic city finds beauty in the bleak
于昏暗中发现美——AriaCreations 团队创造的未来都市
 Overthe last few decades, technology has become a huge part of our everyday lives.It’s enhanced almost every aspect of our existence, from health to industry tosocial media. It’s the reason you can use your smartphone to play Minecraftwhile sat on the toilet. Not that I’ve ever done that, of course.

在过去的几十年里，技术已经成为了我们日常生活中的重要部分。从健康到工业到社交媒体，它几乎在我们生活的方方面面都提供了便利。它也使你能在蹲坑的时候用着智能手机玩着Minecraft。当然我从没有这么做过。
Unfortunately,technology is also at the root of the beautiful post-apocalypse that is Complexcity,an intricate build from the Aria Creations team.
不幸的是，美丽的后启示录，也就是Complexcity，一个来自AriaCreations团队的复杂建筑，它的根源也是技术。
“Our first intention was to create an evenmore complex city than we did with our previous builds,” Aria Creations founderLNeoX tells me via email. “Complexcity seems to be a nice and friendly placebut, from the inside, the city is dead and controlled by artificialintelligence. Isolated from the rest of the world.”
“我们最初的目的是为了创造一个前所未有的复杂城市” Aria Creations的组建者LNeoX通过电子邮件告诉我说，“Complexcity似乎是一个不错的、友好的地方，但我发自内心的说，这个城市是死去的，并且被人工智能所控制。这座城市与世界上的其他地方分隔开了。”





The story of Complexcity is of humans producing robots to build things for us - but then probably regretting that decision when the robots rise up against us. It’s a story we’ve experienced in other sci-fi. I’ve seen about 5,988,434 movies where ungrateful machines start rising up against their poor human creators (as a human myself, I might be a little biased here).
Complexcity的故事是人类制造机器人来为我们建造东西，但当机器人起来反抗我们的时候，大概人们就后悔了那样的决定。这是个我们在其他科幻小说中看到过的故事。我曾经看过大概5,988,434部讲述忘恩负义的机器人开始反抗他们可怜的人类创造者的电影（我自己作为一个人类，可能对此有一些小小的偏见）。

Complexcity tells a similar cautionary tale, with the robots headed toward eliminating humans from the equation altogether. At the time we’re seeing Complexcity, robots are in complete control and nobody knows how the situation will develop.
随着机器人朝着完全除掉人类的方向不断前进，Complexcity传达的也是一个类似的令人警醒的故事。在我们看到Complexcity的那一刻，机器人正完全控制着人类。没有人知道形势将如何发展。

Aria Creations were also unsure how this project would develop when they started building. “Normally we like to make our own concept before we start building but this one was without any planning beforehand,” explains LNeoX.
Aria Creations在开始建造的时候也很不确定这个项目将如何发展。“通常我们喜欢在开始建造之前提出自己的概念，但这次我们没有任何提前准备。” LNeoX解释道。



“We felt confident thateveryone was on the same page and just started the project. Our goal was acomplex city guided by a modern theme. We tried to implement the ideas ofeveryone and adapt on the run.”
“每个人的意见都是一致的，因此我们感觉很自信，就这样开始建造项目。我们的目标是一个现代主题的复杂城市。我们尝试去实施我们每个人的想法，去适应这样的进度。”
Ateam of eight, the toughest part of constructing the city for Aria Creationswas apparently “how we should start this new project.” But once they’d started,they managed to finish construction in just ten days. Maybe we shouldn’t be soworried about robots surpassing us in efficiency after all?
一个八人的团队，对于Aria Creations来说在建造这座城市时最艰难的部分看来就是“我们应该怎么开始这个新的项目”。但他们一旦开始了，就计划着在十天内完成建造。也许我们不必过度担心机器人在效率上超越我们了。（哇，是真的速度）


Even without a team, sometimes you have to let loose and create without critiquing yourself every step of the way. “Not trying to make everything 100% perfect in one go,” explains LNeoX, was something the team learned with the Complexcity project.
即使没有团队，有时你也不得不放手去创造，不去批判自己的每一步行动。“我们不是要一口气让每件事都做到最好” LNeoX解释道，这也是这个团队从Complexcity项目中学到的一些事情。

“A lot of times you end up changing parts over and over again. You lose a lot of time and/or motivation and the modifications don’t [even] add much to the big picture.”
“很多时候你不会再一次次的修改。你失去了很多时间、动力，而这样的修改没有对整体有很大的作用。”

“We always strive to build something greater and focus on layout, composition, concept and colors,” LNeoX tells me. But the secret to a build of this quality is apparently to “be passionate and don’t set yourself to high goals. Just have fun.”
LNeoX告诉我：“我们总是努力去建造更棒的东西，专注于其中的布局、构图、概念和色彩。”但这种质量的建筑的秘密显然是“富有激情，不要给自己定过高的目标。玩的开心就好。”
 


The team at Aria Creations is building quite the impressive portfolio of beautiful, intricate builds.When you have a team that flows together so well, that's when your builds cancome to life, giving birth to wonderful ideas that go beyond what an audiencemight see at first glance! Just keep an eye on the machines that are helpingbuild those ideas, OK? * stares suspiciously at toaster *
Aria Creations团队正在建造令人印象深刻的、美丽的、复杂的建筑。（点击上方英文蓝链可以进入团队的网页）当你有一个很好的结合在一起的团队的时候，也正是你的建筑得以实现，产生出或许是超越观众第一眼看到时的精彩想法的时候！只是多留心那些能让你建立起这些想法的工具，好吗？*可疑地盯着烤面包机*

（实力有限..portfolio在这里实在是不知道怎么翻..希望有大佬来指点一下）


AriaCreations are LNeoX, Asdan, Monsterfish, Meadows, TurnipN0se, Laeonathan,Kellerbier, spaceemotion  
AriaCreations团队的成员是LNeoX,Asdan, Monsterfish, Meadows, TurnipN0se, Laeonathan, Kellerbier, spaceemotion  


译者注：
post-apocalypse译为后启示录，大意为世界末日后的时代橙字部分为译者个人吐槽=-=评分不用消耗自己的人气的，嘿嘿嘿，你们懂得emm第一次来翻译版发帖，希望各位大佬们多多关照，如果有一些翻译上的错误以及不太好的地方，欢迎各位指出，希望能够共同进步！
